description.value:
Allows user to tap into local vox signals and data transmissions, set up with Tech-use Test. Can receive within 1km for number of minutes equal to Tech-Use Test. If test failed by more DoF than Intelligence Bonus, sender/receiver becomes aware of the tapping. Advanced versions allow broadcasts to be copied, allowing them to be hidden and retrieved later.

Requirements

Considered tech-heresy unless properly consecrated by the mechanicus.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
